import React from'react';import{GameMenuCtxWrapper,GameMenuButtonsWrapper,GameMenuHeader,GameMenuBtnText}from'./GameMenuContextStyles';import{MenuButton}from'../../UI/menuButton/MenuButton';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAppDispatch}from'../../../store/hooks';import{setModal,toggleModal}from'../../../store/modalSlice';import{continueGame,quitGame,restartGame}from'../../../store/gameSlice';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var GameMenuContext=function GameMenuContext(){var dispatch=useAppDispatch();var navigate=useNavigate();// Quit Game button handler
var quitGameHandler=function quitGameHandler(){navigate('/');dispatch(setModal({modal:'gameMenu',status:false}));dispatch(quitGame());};// Continue button handler
var continueHandler=function continueHandler(){dispatch(toggleModal('gameMenu'));dispatch(continueGame());};// restart button handler
var restartHandler=function restartHandler(){dispatch(toggleModal('gameMenu'));dispatch(restartGame());};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(GameMenuCtxWrapper,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GameMenuHeader,{children:"pause"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(GameMenuButtonsWrapper,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuButton,{bgColor:"white",textcolor:"black",onClick:continueHandler,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GameMenuBtnText,{children:"continue game"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuButton,{bgColor:"white",textcolor:"black",onClick:restartHandler,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GameMenuBtnText,{children:"restart"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuButton,{bgColor:"red",textcolor:"white",onClick:quitGameHandler,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GameMenuBtnText,{children:"quit game"})})]})]});};export default GameMenuContext;
